sentences.sContent: In this example, the assembler template consists of assembly instructions.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this example, the assembler template consists of assembly instructions.
sentences.sCn: 本例中，汇编程序模板由汇编指令组成。

sentences.sContent: This software logic can be written in a higher level programming language, or it can be executed as assembler logic on a computer chip.
sentences.sContent_eng: This software logic can be written in a higher level programming language, or it can be executed as assembler logic on a computer chip.
sentences.sCn: 这里的软件逻辑可以使用较为高级的编程语言编写，可作为汇编程序逻辑在计算机芯片上执行。

sentences.sContent: This way, if you need to add a register to your code later, the assembler will auto-recalculate the new register numbers and you don't have to alter your register numbering convention.
sentences.sContent_eng: This way, if you need to add a register to your code later, the assembler will auto-recalculate the new register numbers and you don't have to alter your register numbering convention.
sentences.sCn: 这样，如果您以后需要向代码中添加一个寄存器，那么汇编程序就会自动重新计算新寄存器的编号，您也不必更改自己的寄存器编号约定。

synos.tran: [计]汇编程序；汇编机；[机]装配工

remMethod.val: 来自assemble(v. 集合； 聚集)

words.tran: 装配；集合；聚集；集会；集合物；聚集的物或人

trans.tranCn: 汇编程序；汇编机；装配工
trans.tranOther: An assembler is a person, a machine, or a company that assembles the individual parts of a vehicle or a piece of equipment such as a computer
